Classes/Zephyr.html#/s:ZvC6Zephyr6Zephyr.name: syncUbiquitousKeyValueStoreOnChange
Classes/Zephyr.html#/s:ZvC6Zephyr6Zephyr.abstract: If true, then NSUbiquitousKeyValueStore.synchronize() will be called immediately after any change is made.
